events.message: I have just filed a claim for the recent car accident involving my vehicle last week.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to collision damage reported on the car.
An agent has been assigned to manage your car accident claim and will be your point of contact.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and have started the initial processing steps.
Please provide photographs of the damaged vehicle and police collision report to proceed.
All requested documents, including photos and police report, have been submitted successfully.
Our investigation team has started reviewing your vehicle accident claim documents and statements.
The investigation into your auto accident case has been completed with all evidence thoroughly reviewed.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover the repair costs for the damage caused in the collision.
The customer has provided feedback regarding the proposed settlement and requested further clarification.
Your auto accident claim has been approved confirming the settlement will be processed shortly.
The settlement payment for your car accident claim has been issued and should reflect in your account soon.
Your auto accident insurance claim is now closed after successful payment and resolution.
